name: Black and White Contract
text:
Can be used by sending 1 face-up "Dark Contract" card on your field to the Graveyard, Select 1 effect from the following and apply it to 1 "D/D" monster on your field.
This Skill can be used twice per Duel if you begin the Duel with a Deck/Extra Deck that contains no monsters other than "D/D" monsters.
● The selected monster will become a Tuner monster.
● The selected monster will become a Level 4 monster.
● The selected monster will become a Level 8 monster.
